pages.text:
March 2020 County of Marin EMS BLS R1
SHORTNESS OF BREATH BLS
Indications
• Acute or progressive shortness of breath, chest discomfort, wheezing, cyanosis
BLS RMC
Position of comfort
Mild to Moderate Severe
• Pt alert • Altered mental status
• May be unable to speak full • Minimal air movement
sentences • Inability to speak
• Minimal accessory muscle use • Cyanosis
☎
• For upper airway obstruction/ • PHYSICIAN CONSULT for
Stridor: NS 3ml HHN Epi-Pen (or equivalent)
®
• If no improvement MR in 5
min with physician consult
Assist patient with own
medication if available
Transfer care to ALS personnel as soon as possible
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION
• Suspect carbon monoxide in cases
of exposure to fire; do not rely on
pulse oximetry alone in this setting
